theRightPlace: If you are a <bold>DRAW STEEL</bold> player, you are in the right place.
heroScreenDescription: In the <bold>HEROES</bold> screen you can easily create your characters; the hero builder leads you through the process step-by-step.
appUses: You can use the app to track your hero's stamina, conditions, surges, and so on.
appOfflineUses: If you're playing offline, you can export your heroes in PNG or PDF formats (either portrait or landscape).
customizeAbilities: Want something a little different? You can customize any of your abilities to make them more unique to your hero.
heroCustomization: Need to tweak your hero in a way that's not strictly by the book? No problem! You can customize your hero in any number of ways - an extra ability, bonuses to your characteristics, extra skills, retainers, etc.
rulesLookup: In addition, you can quickly look up rules at any time using the Reference button at the bottom right of the screen.
